original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ denti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ sattarasavaggiyānam bhikkhūnam pahāram denti

original: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhākaṁ pahāraṁ dentī”ti.
analyzed: ime āvuso chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ amhākam pahāram denti iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ dassantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ bhikkhūnam pahāram dassanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, kupitā anattamanā bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ dethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ bhikkhūnam pahāram detha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, kupitā anattamanā bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ dassatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ bhikkhūnam pahāram dassatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṁ dadeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ pahāram dadeyya pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
an abhiraddhaḥ āhata cittaḥ khila jātaḥ

original: kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā antamaso uppalapattenapi pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā nissaggiyena vā antamasaḥ uppala pattena api pahāram deti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne upasampanna saññī kupitaḥ anatta manaḥ pahāram deti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne vematiko kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne vematikaḥ kupitaḥ anattamanaḥ pahāram deti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne anupasampanna saññī kupitaḥ anattamano pahāram deti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anupasampannassa kupito anattamano pahāraṁ deti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: anupasampannassa kupitaḥ anattamano pahāram deti āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne an upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
kenaci viheṭhīyamānaḥ mokkha adhippāyaḥ pahāram deti
